title: Submission of Regulations for Approval of Parliament issued under the	Imports and Exports (Control) Act, No.1 of 1969
decision_details:
- The proposal made by Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies to submit following regulations issued under Imports and Exports (Control) Act, No.01 of 1969 to be presented at the Parliament, was granted approval by the Cabinet:

    • Special Import License Regulations No.01 of 2023, published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2312/77 dated 2023-01-01.
      
    • Imports and Exports (Control) Regulations, No.02 of 2023, published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2312/78 dated 2023-01-01.
